title: Possible Audio Glitch (Miss Fortune/Caitlyn)
body:
I've noticed that whenever I proc MF's Passive, Love Tap, and there is a Caitlyn on the enemy team (cannot confirm if this works with a teammate picking Caitlyn), her Love Tap shot will make the same sound Caitlyn's Q makes when it deal damage. I've tested this for at least 3 FULL GAMES and it happened every game.

Also, I'm going to add that it doesn't matter where Caitlyn is on the map, the noise happens with Love Tap procs. I was using the Arcade Miss Fortune skin every time.

This is really infuriating and makes it really hard to concentrate on what you're doing. I will be sure to get a video posted of this audio bug later.

replies.body:
Hey Eevee Girl Alex! 

Thank you for the report! We're actually in the process of putting in a fix for this! :D

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=VohJool3,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-11-18T19:19:07.920+0000)
>
> Hey Eevee Girl Alex! 
> 
> Thank you for the report! We're actually in the process of putting in a fix for this! :D

Excellent news, Katey! Thanks for the response! Believe me, with MF being my favorite ADC (Kog'Maw's second and Quinn's third :P) this patch, this audio glitch bugged the hell out of me.
Haha, I can't say I blame you! Arcade MF is pretty popular, and Cait's being played much more frequently, so this wouldn't be uncommon. :c

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=VohJool3,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-11-18T21:31:00.085+0000)
>
> Haha, I can't say I blame you! Arcade MF is pretty popular, and Cait's being played much more frequently, so this wouldn't be uncommon. :c

I have to say, though, I almost prefer Captain Miss Fortune. It may not be as flashy with its particles, but it's a very elegant skin with nice detail and a really great style for MF.

But, that's besides the point. Thanks again for noticing, glad the bug's being patched out. Any ETA on the fix being released? I want to guess that it's next patch, but I don't wanna take any guesses or add any unnecessary pressure.

Hey, I worked on that skin! Glad you're a fan! 

Unfortunately, it was caught after we started prepping for 5.23, so you'll likely see it in 5.24. Should be on PBE on the next day or so.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=VohJool3,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-18T22:00:19.986+0000)
>
> Hey, I worked on that skin! Glad you're a fan! 
> 
> Unfortunately, it was caught after we started prepping for 5.23, so you'll likely see it in 5.24. Should be on PBE on the next day or so.

Aw, that sucks. Oh well, at least there's an ETA on it. Thanks so much, Katey, you're awesome <3
No worries at all, thanks for taking the time to report this!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=VohJool3,comment-id=0001000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-19T19:45:17.047+0000)
>
> No worries at all, thanks for taking the time to report this!

Wasn't a problem. Always glad to help out the Riot team! Send my regards, double for Lyte :P
i can confirm this glitch, this also happens for mirror matches when the enemy MF doesnt have the arcade skin (but they fact they dont have it is bad enough)
